dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6637 IH: Love Them Both Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Miller of Illinois (for herself, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Mr. LaMalfa, Ms. Boebert, Mr. Self, and Mr. Harris) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To prohibit regulations implementing the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act from applying to abortion or the coverage of abortion or abortion-related services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Love Them Both Act of 2023.

section.header: Regulatory implementation of the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act
section.text: The Equal Employment Opportunity Commission and the Board of Directors of the Office of Congressional Workplace Rights may not, pursuant to section 105 of the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act (42 U.S.C. 2000ggâ€“3), finalize, implement, or enforce any regulation that applies to abortion or the coverage of abortion or abortion-related services.
